title: Jay Jays: Cas
creator_contributor_role: Over Newton Anglican Community College, production facilities
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising
abstract: A short advertisement publicising casual clothing company, "Jay-Jays"
description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. This short advertisement is publicising a casual clothing company, "Jay-Jays" and its range of beach/bathing clothing modellled by young girls and guys.
